snippet.title: My Secret Pets! - Lufna ~Chapter 1~
snippet.description:
Supporting game developer by buying this game on...
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/447180
IOS: https://itunes.apple.com/au/app/my-secret-pets!/id903842321?mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.d3p.kemono_en&hl=en

By supporting game developer, they can create more games for us in the future :)

Ps. I want you to understand that I won't do the whole guy's route. Just prologue and first episode of each guy including walkthroughs&CGs since my propose for uploading this games are for promoting the game and supporting the game developer.

The only thing I can do if you want to know each guys' story is to do Thai review and have English subtitle. I'm not sure when I'll do that. However, the most important thing is to support the game developer by buying their games if you can. Playing by yourself is funnier than watching it, you know? :)

All songs and images belongs to its rightful owners (Dogenzaka Lab). No copyright infringement intended.

อุดหนุนเกมแท้เพื่อส่งเสริมให้ผู้พัฒนาเกมทำเกมดีๆออกมาให้เราเล่นกันนะคะ ^^

----------------------------------------------------

Seii K's contact
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SeiiReviewGames/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYrVAybKEBCGbjafnUv66Yw
